TopPCE¶

public class TopPCE¶

Methods¶

getDuration¶

public Long getDuration(Date start, Date end)¶

makeReserved¶

public Optional<ReservedBlueprintE> makeReserved(RequestedBlueprintE requested, ScheduleSpecificationE schedSpec, List<Date> reservedSched)¶

Given a requested Blueprint (made up of a VLAN or Layer3 Flow) and a Schedule Specification, attempt to reserve available resources to meet the demand. If it is not possible, return an empty Optional

Parameters:
  • requested –
    • Requested blueprint
  • schedSpec –
    • Requested schedule
Throws:
  • PSSException –
  • PCEException –
Returns:

ReservedBlueprint containing the reserved resources, or an empty Optional if the reservation is not possible.

verifyRequested¶

public void verifyRequested(RequestedBlueprintE requested)¶

Confirm that the requested blueprint is valid.

Parameters:
  • requested – The requested blueprint.
Throws:
  • PCEException –
